title: Add observability for scheduled sync jobs across CRM, Support, and Product Analytics integrations

sections.text: Implement consistent logging and metrics for scheduled sync runs (start/end timestamps, duration, records processed, API errors, and retries) for each integration type. Surface a per-connection sync status (last successful run, last failure reason) to make it clear when data is stale and why. This will enable reliable diagnosis of scheduled sync failures before making functional changes in subsequent tickets.
